Uses of Class
com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.HederaException

  • Packages that use HederaException 
    Package Description
    com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk  
    com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk.contract  

    • Uses of HederaException in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk

      Methods in com.hedera.hashgraph.sdk that throw HederaException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccountId Client.createAccount(PublicKey publicKey, long initialBalance)
      Deprecated. 
      hides useful configuration parameters for accounts and makes it difficult to handle errors properly; if an error occurs while fetching the receipt for the AccountCreateTransaction then the transaction ID is lost. You should build and execute your own AccountCreateTransaction instead.
      Resp HederaCall.execute()
      Deprecated. 
      use HederaCall.execute(Client) instead.
      Resp HederaCall.execute(Client client) 
      Resp QueryBuilder.execute(Client client, Duration timeout) 
      Resp HederaCall.execute(Client client, Duration retryTimeout) 
      TransactionId TransactionBuilder.execute(Client client, Duration retryTimeout) 
      Resp QueryBuilder.execute(Duration timeout)
      Deprecated. 
      Resp HederaCall.execute(Duration retryTimeout)
      Deprecated. 
      use HederaCall.execute(Client, Duration) instead.
      TransactionReceipt Transaction.executeForReceipt()
      Deprecated. 
      Makes it difficult to discern whether an error occurred while executing or while fetching a receipt. Call HederaCall.execute(Client) then Transaction.getReceipt(Client) and handle the errors separately from each.
      TransactionReceipt TransactionBuilder.executeForReceipt()
      Deprecated. 
      Makes it difficult to discern whether an error occurred while executing or while fetching a receipt. If an error occurs while fetching the receipt then the transaction ID is difficult to retrieve.

      Call HederaCall.execute(Client) then TransactionId.getReceipt(Client) and handle the errors separately from each.
      TransactionRecord Transaction.executeForRecord()
      Deprecated. 
      Makes it difficult to discern whether an error occurred while executing or while fetching a record. Call HederaCall.execute(Client) then Transaction.getRecord(Client) and handle the errors separately from each.
      TransactionRecord TransactionBuilder.executeForRecord()
      Deprecated. 
      Makes it difficult to discern whether an error occurred while executing or while fetching a record. If an error occurs while fetching the record then the transaction ID is difficult to retrieve.

      Call HederaCall.execute(Client) then TransactionId.getRecord(Client) and handle the errors separately from each.
      AccountInfo Client.getAccount(AccountId id) 
      long Client.getAccountBalance(AccountId id) 
      long QueryBuilder.getCost(Client client) 
      TransactionReceipt TransactionId.getReceipt(Client client) 
      TransactionReceipt Transaction.getReceipt(Client client) 
      TransactionReceipt TransactionId.getReceipt(Client client, Duration timeout) 
      TransactionReceipt Transaction.getReceipt(Client client, Duration timeout) 
      TransactionRecord TransactionId.getRecord(Client client) 
      TransactionRecord Transaction.getRecord(Client client) 
      TransactionRecord TransactionId.getRecord(Client client, Duration timeout) 
      TransactionRecord Transaction.getRecord(Client client, Duration timeout) 
      protected abstract Resp HederaCall.mapResponse(RawResp raw) 
      protected Resp QueryBuilder.mapResponse(com.hedera.hashgraph.proto.Response raw) 
      protected TransactionId Transaction.mapResponse(com.hedera.hashgraph.proto.TransactionResponse response) 
      protected TransactionId TransactionBuilder.mapResponse(com.hedera.hashgraph.proto.TransactionResponse response) 
      long QueryBuilder.queryCost()
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to QueryBuilder.getCost(Client)
      TransactionReceipt Transaction.queryReceipt()
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to Transaction.getReceipt(Client)
      TransactionReceipt Transaction.queryReceipt(Duration timeout)
      Deprecated. 
      renamed to Transaction.getReceipt(Client, Duration)
      TransactionId Client.transferCryptoTo(AccountId recipient, long amount)
      Deprecated. 
      difficult to overload for multi-party transfers; additionally, if an error occurs while fetching the receipt for the CryptoTransferTransaction then the transaction ID is lost. You should build and execute your own CryptoTransferTransaction instead.
